remarks: Entries of an identity matrix, deduction form.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Jul-2018.)
statement:
mat1.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
mat1.o $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) $.
mat1.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
mat1ov.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. Fin ) $.
mat1ov.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
mat1ov.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. N ) $.
mat1ov.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. N ) $.
mat1ov.u $e |- U = ( 1r ` A ) $.
mat1ov $p |- ( ph -> ( I U J ) = if ( I = J , .1. , .0. ) ) $.
